title: A report on arsenic removal from water via adsorption of an arsenomolybdate complex on S–CuFe2O4 adsorbents
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,2030-2047
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00300D, Paper
Ejaz Hussain, Meryam Sultana, Muhammad Zeeshan Abid, Aqsa Khan Buzdar, Hamdy Khamees Thabet, Salah M. El-Bahy, Muhammad Jalil, Abdul Rauf, Zeinhom M. El-Bahy, Khezina Rafiq
Ground drinking water in many areas of Pakistan is contaminated by dissolved arsenic contents This work aims to estimate and eliminate the arsenic contents from the ground water used for drinking purpose in Layyah district (Punjab – PK).
